attributes.action: Dissolve Parliament and call for a General Election.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British public have lost all trust in the the current Parliament. There can be no future for Democracy while the incumbents continue to line their pockets with honest hardworking taxpayers money. The elecorate must be given the opportunity to vote in a government that will remember who they work for and who pays there wages.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
